column5: SCON Havent been adding Waiting for a big seller to add unless news pop comes first
SCON It all comes down to their deal with India and how quickly they can get it out

SCON ENG is well funded so they can afford to wait 360 days before a RS SCON is not well funded any new money coming into SCON does not want to get RS out of their shares so they are forced to RS if they need more cash so that is the situation here
SCON Market needs to know if they will be producing full capacity if so then they should be fine if not they should go to OTC or sell out

SCON However since they are at 090 and they only need 100 it pretty much comes down to the conductus wire they have said they will deliver to India They will still need more capital as well so this is not the greatest of positions atm
SCON In Oct 2015 they got a NASDAQ warning letter about being under 100 they reverse split in July 2016 In 2018 they got a NASDAQ warning in May and RS in July so that was a quick one
